price: او دا چې زموږ د پالونکي شان ډېر لوړ دى، هغه نه څوك مېرمن او نه زوى نيولى.
arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ تَعَٰلَىٰ جَدُّ رَبِّنَا مَا ٱتَّخَذَ صَٰحِبَةٗ وَلَا وَلَدٗا

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wa-annahu taʿālā jaddu rabbinā mā ittakhadha ṣāḥibatan walā waladan
